DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether telephone support improve clinical outcome veteran begin outpatient treatment posttraumatic stress disorder . Participants randomly assign receive either usual care usual care supplement biweekly monitor support telephone first 3 month treatment . Patients condition compare PTSD symptom , engagement treatment , violence drink 4 month 12 month enter treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: This multisite randomize control trial test whether 3-month period provide telephone monitoring PTSD patient supplement usual specialty mental health care improve 12-month clinical outcome ( reduction PTSD symptom , violence , substance use ) . Secondarily , study determine whether telephone monitoring promotes well engagement outpatient treatment ( Number mental health psychotherapy visit 3-month intervention period ) . Demand VA PTSD treatment increase troop return combat deployment Afghanistan Iraq . Telemedicine likely important component develop effective efficient model PTSD care improve patient function treatment utilization . It hop use telephone case monitor inexpensive adjunct standard care may improve clinical outcome reduce hospitalization among veteran PTSD .
